title: "We want URF!!"
body:
"OMFG ARURF SO UNFUN WTF RITO"

Just be happy you got it.

replies.body: They wanted URF not ARURF. At least with URF you can fight cancer with cancer but in this mode its a literal diceroll to who has the most obnoxious team.

> [{quoted}](name=iMute Everybody,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AAMpE1Np,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-15T20:45:50.108+0000)
>
> At least with URF you can fight cancer with cancer...

Medically impossible.
actually, in rare medical occurrences, a patient has 2 cancers and even though they harm the patient, they also drastically slow each other's growth; fighting cancer with cancer :D

Okay... you've piqued my interest.

As I research this phenomenon, please provide me additional peer-reviewed studies (seriously... want to know the deets if this is true!!)

I saw it on house m.d. (the tv show) once so it must be legit LOL

here is the first link I found on the front page of google tho: https://www.statnews.com/2016/02/08/fighting-cancer-with-cancer/

> [{quoted}](name=Yuki Kaji,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AAMpE1Np,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-08-15T22:28:20.411+0000)
>
>peer-reviewed studies

Close enough.

> [{quoted}](name=Doodlzzz,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AAMpE1Np,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-08-15T22:25:28.474+0000)
>
> actually, in rare medical occurrences, a patient has 2 cancers and even though they harm the patient, they also drastically slow each other's growth; fighting cancer with cancer :D

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aI0euMFAWF8

for real nothing is more depressing then when you roll only crap champions or get or roll nunu/tahm constantly.
you get shit while the other team got zed, fiora and syndra now that's fun to play against

> [{quoted}](name=royalpaste,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AAMpE1Np,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-08-15T21:20:20.469+0000)
>
> for real nothing is more depressing then when you roll only crap champions or get or roll nunu/tahm

Get Redi 4 Yeti & Unbench the Kench

If nothing else, you can troll the shit out of people as those two. xD
Nunu is pretty fun in URF. It's like Singed in One for All.

or more like:  if you have any minions, run and hide for I shall never die while I literally snowball you

XD
I don't get why they don't just give us normal URF with 5 bans.
I am happy I got it.  I'm only frustrated that karthus is also free this week.  Either a terrible oversight or just rito being evil masterminds.

a little bit of magic resist goes a long way

also, if you get {{champion:25}} , you can laugh in his face the entire laning phase XD

that magic shield of hers is nuts against magical enemies and even greater against crowd control

If AD I just build the spell shield on channel or lifesteal and ignore it.  If I'm AP I just went zhonyas and never get hit.  If I'm a shielder, well you get the point.

Funny though was when I played as him I just farmed and spammed ult regardless of scenario.  Early game karth ult spa. Really punished people that itemize wrong.

I actually learned how to deal with Karthus over the span of the weekend. I will not miss him.....

-sees Ekko on this week-

Uh oh....

I never asked for ARURF and I never liked it, the only reason I've played ARURF is because I was hoping to get the champions I wanted. I only got one champion that I wanted, once. I've never dodged so much in my life and I won't miss it when it's gone. I will always prefer URF over ARURF.
I played AURF because the games are faster, and I'm trying to finish those damn quests.
I think people wanted to use their own champs in URF, rather than get own champ - someone dodges - get udyr, play vs completely unfair matchup.

Not only did we get it but we got it for an entire patch! It'd be down by now til Friday but it's not. 

Either way people just want to whine. I'd keep a count for each thread I've seen but that'd be over 3 dozen by now.
We want URF not ARURF.  ARURF is actual fucking garbage.  If they want to release both modes that would've been fine but no, they only released the garbage version.
URF is still URF even if your champion is given to you at random and there are no duplicates. You can't tell me I'm wrong for that because that's **literally** the only difference I see.
Then you're obviously do not have good vision

Do you know how to read though?

The only difference between ARURF and URF is that ARURF is random.

And the ones complaining are mostly those who want to abuse Eve, Wukong, Shaco, Hecarim, etc. with only a handfull of legitimate players who wanna try out something offmeta.

URF was shit simply because you got flamed for picking offmeta.
Don't like ARURF? Don't play it. Sucks to be on the receiving end of this, doesn't it?

And some of us simply hate getting shitty pick while still facing a lot of Evelynns, Fizzs and Yis. Got Fizz and Yi twice in row in my games. Doesn't feel much random when you see basically the same champions. What's the point of trying somethng new when your screen is grey most of the time anyway. Bans could solve this btw.

ok, and players don't flame in normal or ranked games because?

yeah, i'd much rather pick my champion and enjoy the game than have games that can end with a 7:1 kill ratio in favor of one side

most of all, in urf, you get to do whatever you freaking want with whoever you want...yet ARURF...interesting concept, but people abuse its system just like they abuse aram

The ones complaining are the ones who want to play whoever the fuck they want.  Don't act like you're so high and mighty by saying people want to "abuse" a champ.

And the difference between URF and ARURF is indeed that it's random, glad you figured it out.  It's also the reason why a lot of people don't like it.  If you didn't like URF, then why didn't you follow your own advice and not play it?  Why complain and whine to the end of days about how you only saw the same champs?

I didn't play URF because it got boring after 1 game.

You people told me to stop playing URF if I don't like it, now eat your own advice.

That's still a pretty important difference. You get the same problem you have in aram (games seemingly decided by rng, people with better champ pools winning more games), except it's a lot worse because the difference between the strongest and weakest urf champs is much bigger.

It also doesn't adequately fix the problem of not being able to play off-meta champs. Champs like yas were garbage in urf, and they're still garbage in arurf. You practically never get games where everyone has garbage champs so it feels more balanced because people will just reroll them and such.

I'd take arurf over not having either, but regular urf would be a lot better.

> [{quoted}](name=GeminiRune,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AAMpE1Np,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-08-15T21:00:16.423+0000)
>
> URF is still URF even if your champion is given to you at random and there are no duplicates. You can't tell me I'm wrong for that because that's **literally** the only difference I see.

Except when you get Irelia three games in a row and absolutely hate playing her.

I gotta admit i atleast played 2 urf games before i was done with it. So far i've only played 1 arurf and that was a disaster.

I can't believe 1 person can say both "blame kindred for jungling in urf" and " chill it's urf do w/e you want" within a 20 minutes game.
People complain about _**All Random**_ URF. Is reading comprehension so rare nowadays?

must be pretty nice to be that oblivious to comprehend the idea that people make accounts that completely null the point of the random part. allow me to retort in a similar fashion as you so you might grasp the idiocy of this... i have 20 champs, 5 of them are good. good thing its random though so people can't bitch when I get sion and the enemy team gets zed,eve, morgana, syndra. good thing its random. how dare these people complain about it.
That's the small group of people who post on the boards complaining, there's still the bigger group of us who are appreciative but don't post on the boards.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q-xxsMJIWs4

The queue is quite fast still. People obviously enjoy playing it; people just come to boards to whine about not being able to pick their cheese picks every game and having to face things they'd otherwise ban.

I think the silence of the masses playing it is being mistaken for nobody liking it.
ARURF isn't a substitute for urf lol

> [{quoted}](name=Starboyˇ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AAMpE1Np,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2017-08-16T01:19:38.791+0000)
>
> ARURF isn't a substitute for urf lol

It is not the equivalence (if anything they're almost opposites of each other in terms of what they offer), but it is unfortunately the replacement. Ever since arurf came out we've never had urf once.
And you never will :)
ARURF =/= URF.

This happens every time URF is out. People always complain and then wonder why they rarely get it. Personally, I think URF should be a custom option instead of its own entire game mode. That would stop all of the complaining and free up a RGM slot.
Riot doesn't want mass amounts of people playing customs like old ARAMs for the same reason these game modes are temporary, they care too much about summoners rift players having longer queues.

> [{quoted}](name=ZyniX,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AAMpE1Np,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2017-08-16T03:18:04.873+0000)
>
> Riot doesn't want mass amounts of people playing customs like old ARAMs for the same reason these game modes are temporary, they care too much about summoners rift players having longer queues.

Diversity is what helps a game last. Hopefully, Riot doesn't truly believe that Summoner's Rift alone can carry them forever.

This is only my second ARURF and I hated it the first time, (bad game knowledge, small champ pool) now I'm just in love.

URF is going to be dictated by bad team comps more often than 'who got the OP champs'. The usual rules apply (eg, Xin is weak to CC) but instead of stupidity creating the bad comp, it's mostly luck. This takes away a LOT of the tilt associated with real games since you can't blame your teammates for their terrible picks =)

Also if you're stuck vs something OP with skillshots it's great practice, and you can still goof around with silly splitpush tactics and try ridiculous builds and stuff, and no-one'll mind.

Except we asked for URF not ARURF. Huge fucking difference which you apparently do not understand.

URF had BANS, and CUSTOM PICKS to have personalized FUN.

ARURF has NONE of the above. It's fucking RANDOM. Nobody likes this shit. Or rather, most people.
"random" for those of us without champ loaded accounts. gotta love the fact i couldn't refund a few champs like sion and nunu for this.
LET CATCH MY SON TRYING TO HAVE FUN !
lmao I played arurf and faced a trynd and karma, boi is that annoying

U-Ultra      This is AR-Urf
R-Rapid
F-Fire
It's like the people who wanted it, aren't the ones complaining. (>_>)
